title: Smart credits Doncic with assist for Lakers move
description: Marcus Smart credited Luka Doncic for recruiting him to Los Angeles at his introductory news conference with the Lakers on Tuesday.
author: Dave McMenamin

title: Terps' Locksley: Lost locker room amid pay divide
description: Maryland coach Mike Locksley admitted Tuesday that he "lost" the locker room in 2024 over which players to compensate.
author: Adam Rittenberg

title: 'Is this a movie?' - England overcome odds to reach final
description: England have overcome all odds to reach the Euro 2025 - so how have they done it?

title: Kelly's extra-time goal gives England victory over Italy
description: England stage an incredibly late comeback to reach the Euro 2025 final with a 96th-minute equaliser from Michelle Agyemang and an extra-time penalty rebound from Chloe Kelly.

title: Report: Chris Godwin underwent another minor ankle procedure this spring
description: The Buccaneers placed receiver Chris Godwin on the active/physically unable to perform list Tuesday.

title: Scheffler Shouts Out to Wife Following Open Championship
description: Scheffler wins Open Championship, chasing grand slam before age 30

title: Wiegman: Kelly 'thrives on' producing England magic
description: Sarina Wiegman hailed Chloe Kelly for "thriving on" producing in the big moments after her 119th-minute goal sent England into the Euro 2025 final.

title: Bunting wins thrilling tie-break vs Anderson to book World Matchplay quarters spot
description: Stephen Bunting pulled off a thrilling 12-10 tie-break win over Gary Anderson to book his spot in his second ever quarter-final of the World Matchplay at Blackpool's Winter Gardens.
